interfaces.comment: Signal Dromajo about the instruction commit.
Signal Global Store Perform from DCache Metadata Write Arbiter.
Signal Store Completed, store completed is when it is no more in STQ. It may be in some intermediate state before being written to cache.
Signal goldmem about the insertion of memory op into the pipeline.
Signal the model about the commit of memory operation.
Signal the model about the local perform of the store.
Signal the nuke of the store.
Signal the commit of the store.
